title: Strengthening Systems Design Practical Competencies: Designing Online Science Education Simulations Based on Multiple Intelligences

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational scientific literacy and leadership experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can derive science problem-solving strategies utilizing three or more multiple intelligence types (linguistic, logical-mathematical, spatial, etc.) in VR simulation environments.
Learners can identify their dominant intelligence types and establish improvement plans based on multimodal learning analytics data.
Learners can apply collaboration strategies considering team members’ diverse intelligence types through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
